meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rabid.
meanings.sent1: The rabidness of the dog's behavior was alarming.
meanings.sent2: The rabidness of the crowd's excitement was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The rabidness of the squirrel's determination to find nuts was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The rabidness of the storm's fury shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The rabidness of the toddler's tantrum made everyone stop and stare.

meanings.sent1: Her rabidness enthusiasm for the project inspired the whole team.
meanings.sent2: The rabidness winds uprooted trees and caused chaos.
meanings.sent3: The rabidness dance moves of the penguin entertained the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The rabidness growth of the plant took over the entire garden.
meanings.sent5: The rabidness speed of the car left everyone breathless.
